channel.title: Earnings Surprises on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Earnings Surprises on FinanClub

item.title: SWN
item.description: score:134 Chances: Higher oil production and reduction in marketing purchases aid Southwestern’s Q4 earnings. The longer-term bull case for natural gas rests on expanding U.S. exports, benefiting companies like Southwestern Energy. Southwestern Energy delivered earnings and revenue surprises for the quarter, indicating potential for stock growth.

item.title: YMM
item.description: score:40 Chances: Full Truck Alliance’s stock price might be vulnerable due to the large stake held by institutions. The average of price targets set by Wall Street analysts indicates a potential upside of 40.2% in Full Truck Alliance Co. Ltd. Sponsored ADR (YMM).
